Roses are red Trump lacks tact He lost the popular vote His victory is an alternative fact
Can I still use "Alternatively," as a filler in my essays or is it now inappropriate in academia?
Alternative fact: because we all joked about entering the Twilight Zone under Trump's presidency. The alternative universe is now.
Did anyone make a joke about alternative music being an alternative fact?
I get it now. "Make America Great Again" is an alternative fact. America was never *that* great. He got us.
